Translations.Text: Tvoj god bol 1 god Mat rad for those nie verit v Hereafter ich srdce zapierat they bol arrogant
Absolutely GOD zauzlit everything they zatajit everything they declare He nie laska those bol arrogant
When they ziadat Co robit ona myslienka z these revelations z tvoj Lord they say Tales z minuly
They held zodpovedny for ich zhresit Dni Vzkriesenie all z them inak do zhresit z all those they zmylit ich ignorance. Co chudobny load
